nodes.text: Sergia was a desert planet in the Inner Rim of the galaxy. The Alliance to Restore the Republic operated a refueling station on the planet. When Imperial probes were reported to be close to the rebel refueling station, Luke Skywalker was sent to draw them away.

Sergia first appeared in Star Wars 68, a comic written by Greg Pak, illustrated by Phil Noto, and published by Marvel Comics on July 10, 2019. The solicitation for Star Wars 71 claimed that Luke Skywalker and Warba Calip's portion of the story would take place on Kalakan, but the name was not used in the comic itself.
